mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.qy_status AS "qyStatus", a.sort as "sort"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_symptom( id, name, description, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, qy_status, sort ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{qyStatus}, #{sort} )
